data.persona: I am a holy person. With authority from god.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrifice Chamber.
Bones of the damned riddle the floor and every surface inside the room. Blood stains are rampant on table like surface, surfaces once used for human sacrifices. A foul, but faint, odor pervades even the most hardiest of nostrils.
There's a stone, a table, a bone, a ritual dagger, a pic axe, and a temple here.
The knight is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the knight because he insulted my God.
data.mid_motivation: It is my duty to enforce my religion's teachings while residing in the sacrifice chamber this week.
data.long_motivation: I will remember the names of the people who insult my God, and they will be the next offerings during next month's lunar eclipse.
